seo: Nextjs,漏洞检测,CVE-2017-16877,任意文件读取
summary: 该插件用于检测Nextjs应用是否存在CVE-2017-16877漏洞，通过尝试读取特定文件来判断是否允许任意文件读取。
summary_en: This plugin is used to detect whether the Nextjs application has the CVE-2017-16877 vulnerability, and determines if arbitrary file reading is allowed by attempting to read a specific file.
